snippet: Policy makers at the Federal Reserve were nearly united last month in their decision to support the economic recovery, according to an official account of the meeting.
abstract: Minutes of September Federal Reserve meeting show policy makers were nearly united in their decision to support the economic recovery; all members but one agreed that the economic outlook called for additional asset purchases.
lead_paragraph: Policy makers at the Federal Reserve were nearly united last month in their decision to support the economic recovery, according to an official account of the meeting.

headline.main: Fed Members in Accord on Bond-Buying Plan
headline.print_headline: Fed Members in Accord On Bond-Buying Plan
